panels.title: Total CPU usage for all containers in deployment
Total memory usage for all containers in deployment (Gi)
Average CPU usage for all containers in deployment
Average memory usage for all containers in deployment (GI)

targets.expr: sum (count by (pod,container)(kube_pod_container_info{namespace="$namespace", container!=""}) unless sum by (pod,container)(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="$namespace", resource="cpu"}))

panels.title: Containers without CPU requests by namespace

names: sum (count by (pod,container)(kube_pod_container_info{namespace="mothership", container!=""}) unless sum by (pod,container)(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="mothership", resource="memory"}))

targets.expr: sum (count by (pod,container)(kube_pod_container_info{namespace="$namespace", container!=""}) unless sum by (pod,container)(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="$namespace", resource="memory"}))

panels.title: Containers without memory requests by namespace

targets.expr: sum by(container, pod) (increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{namespace="$namespace"}[5m])) / sum by(container, pod) (increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{namespace="$namespace"}[5m])) > (25 / 100)

panels.title: Detecting containers with very tight CPU limits
Detecting containers with very tight memory limits

names: sum (count by (pod,container)(kube_pod_container_info{namespace="analytics-services", container!=""}) unless sum by (pod,container)(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="analytics-services", resource="cpu"}))

targets.expr: sum (count by (pod,container)(kube_pod_container_info{namespace="$namespace", container!=""}) unless sum by (pod,container)(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="$namespace", resource="cpu"}))

panels.title: Containers without CPU limits in namespace

targets.expr: sum (count by (pod,container)(kube_pod_container_info{namespace="$namespace", container!=""}) unless sum by (namespace,pod,container)(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="$namespace",resource="memory"}))

panels.title: Containers without memory limits in namespace
